data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jendek, Eduard, Nakládal, Oto (2017): Revision of the Agrilus wittemani species - group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Agrilini) with description of three new species from India and Myanmar. Zootaxa 4365 (4): 480-486, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4365.4.7|16 occurrences
